title: why can i get an s?!?!
body:

{{champion:55}}  and it was norms so can you please buff the grading system for season 8 and this has happened to me at least 20 times but i thought they were glitches but now im over with it so plz buff the grading system. 


Niko.P

replies.body: haha funny thing is that I struggled to get the 3rd s/s+ on her for level 7. I ended up just taking her bot as a "support" and got it right away haha
Assuming you were playing Kat, it was probably easier to get a higher score with her as support since not many people play her support.

The most important thing to keep in mind with mastery scores is that you're not just being graded on your own performance. You're being compared to everyone else who played the champion you were playing and in which lane you were playing. Also, a lot more goes into those scores than just KDA and CS. Things like vision are calculated as well.
I’ve left a post recently that I got a S and didn’t get a chest have not gotten a response or fix to this bug
